channel.title: Spanish Professores.Pod
channel.itunes:author: Tony Spanos
channel.description: These podcasts/vidocasts have to do with different idiomatic expression used in the Hispanic world. They also have to do with certain grammar concepts as communicated in narratives about personal experiences. These podcats/videocasts are created and produced by students and professors in the Spanish department at Weber State University.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Podcasting/Videocasting in Spanish at Weber State University in the Department of Foreign Languages
channel.itunes:summary: These podcasts/vidocasts have to do with different idiomatic expression used in the Hispanic world. They also have to do with certain grammar concepts as communicated in narratives about personal experiences. These podcats/videocasts are created and produced by students and professors in the Spanish department at Weber State University.
channel.itunes:keywords: Spanish, español, language classes, culture, higher education, idiomatic expressions, grammar,
